content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) facing DOWN (connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (16.0,73.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (17.5,70.5) (facing furnace, has fuel)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,76.5) (output storage)
- Output inserter at (16.5,75.5) (connects furnace to chest)

### Power Generation System at (-11.5,69.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-11.5,69.5) (working, producing water)
- Boiler at (-6.5,70.0) (out of fuel)
- Steam engine at (-2.5,70.5) (not connected to power network)
- Pipe network connecting water system (positions: (-11.5,68.5), (-10.5,68.5), (-9.5,68.5), (-9.5,69.5), (-8.5,69.5), (-8.5,70.5))
- Steam pipe network (positions: (-5.5,67.5), (-4.5,67.5), (-3.5,67.5), (-2.5,67.5), (-6.5,68.5), (-5.5,68.5))

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement distance errors
- Repeated attempts to place entities too far from player position (steps 9,11,13)
- Solution: Always move to target area before placing entities (max placement distance is 10 tiles)

### Entity placement collision errors
- Multiple failed attempts to place chests/inserters at (15.5,73.5) due to existing furnace (steps 12,14,15)
- Solution: 
  - Check for existing entities before placement
  - Choose different positions when collisions occur
  - Increase spacing between components

### Power system issues
- Steam engine not connected to power network despite having pipes
- Solution:
  - Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and engine
  - Add fuel to boiler to generate steam
  - Verify power pole connections

### Transport belt connection errors
- Still attempting direct furnace-to-belt connections (step 8)
- Solution: Always use inserters between furnaces and belts

### Setup function failures
- Multiple mining setup functions failing due to placement issues (steps 14,15)
- Solution: 
  - Add collision checks to setup functions
  - Implement error handling for placement failures
  - Verify all required positions are clear before placement
